posts.content: 66 LHD walkthrough for sale with all panels to complete plus RGB gearbox with creative drop kit.Been blasted and epoxy primed full van and underneath. Chassis in great condition with no welding needed.,new long and short side from autocraft,new rear full corners and engine lid.short side and one corner already welded.front roof panel from Schofield's due to condition of existing which has been prepped for fitting.new front inner and outer apron to be included in sale.poptop roof and frame,new rear hatch skin fitted.lots more parts lights bumpers etc to mostly complete.devon walkthrough interior comes with van.all 4 doors are mint condition.priorities changed due to covid.pics on request 12k Ono.
Can I have some more pictures of the van thanks paul paulhove@hotmail.co,uk
I'd like pics as well please. Will PM email details. thanks!
